title: Add more service packages (services) to browse and book

requirements.text: Pre-populate the backend with additional service packages so the Services page shows a larger catalog without requiring manual service creation.
acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh canister install (when there are no services yet), calling getServices returns a non-empty list with at least 8 distinct services.
Each pre-populated service has an English name and description and a non-zero pricePerVisit.
Pre-population does not create duplicates if the canister is already populated (i.e., it only seeds when services is empty).

constraints: Keep all Motoko logic in the single backend actor (backend/main.mo).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding admin dashboards or role-based access control for creating/editing services.
Changing the booking flow, booking fields, or booking status lifecycle.
Introducing new third-party services or databases.
